title: Berthold Akzidenz Grotesk…
content:
Hello people,

Haven't been here for a while, and certainly not since the start of the year, so to coincide with CNY, Happy New Year to you all. Anyway, I came for a reason, and that reason was to ask:

Is [Berthold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822211923/http:/typophile.com/wiki/H.%20berthold%20AG) [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822211923/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Akzidenz%20Grotesk) available to purchase as separate weights? A client has requested we use the regular and medium weights to set their product copy… but they appear to only be available to buy as a family. Is this right?

Thanks for your help,  
Higashi
author: higashi

comments.content:
Berthold is not very user-friendly in that regard.

Which puts them right up there with House Industries, HTF, many others.

Ah, yes, you've just reminded me of a similar experience I had with [H&FJ](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822211923/http:/typophile.com/wiki/hoefler_and_frere_jones). I've got a few unused weights of [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822211923/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotham) gathering dust somwhere too… Thanks for the reply pattyfab!

[Basic Commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822211923/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=basic%20commercial), based on similar sources is available in separate weights.
